column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Prevents the holder from going berserk while [[Mega Evolution|Mega-Evolved]]. It has seven notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from Darkrai on Distress Mountain on the Air Continent. It's said to prevent a Mega-Evolved Pokémon from going berserk if the Pokémon holds it.

column14: effect=Prevents the holder from taking critical-hits. It has three notches.
column15: descsmd=It prevents enemy Pokémon's moves from resulting in a critical hit. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: effect=Keeps items in Bag from getting sticky. It has three notches.
column16: it prevents carried items from getting sticky as a result of traps or other means. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: effect=Prevents the holder from getting poisoned or badly poisoned. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It prevents the holder from getting poisoned or badly poisoned. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: effect=Prevents the holder from getting confused. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It prevents the holder from getting confused. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: effect=Prevents any lowering of the holder's stats. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It prevents all of the holder's stats from being lowered. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: effect=Prevents the holder from going to sleep. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It prevents the holder from getting the [[Status condition (Mystery Dungeon)|sleep]]
column16: yawning
column17: or nightmare status conditions. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: effect=Protects the holder from the effects of weather. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It shields the holder from weather
column16: as if it's already clear. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column17: locsmd=Given by {{p|Roselia}} at [[Serene Village]] after clearing [[Nectar Meadow]]

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Prevents the holder from all bad status conditions and stat reductions. It has one notch.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from Rayquaza at the Dragon Gate on the Grass Continent. It prevents the holder from having bad status conditions or a reduction in stats.

column14: effect= Increases the Attack of the holder by 10. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It boosts the holder's Attack. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Increases the HP of the holder by 50. It has five notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Ancient Treasures
column18: which you received from Phione and Manaphy in the Seafloor Ruins in the Sea of Wonders. It's said to have the effect of sharply increasing HP.
column19: locsmd=Given by {{p|Manaphy}} and {{p|Phione}} in the [[Seafloor Ruins]]

column14: effect=Using the same move in consecutive turns boosts the holder's critical-hit rate. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It boosts the critical-hit rate if the holder uses the same move it used the turn before. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Increases both the Attack and Special Attack of the holder by 20. It has five notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Ancient Treasures. You received it from Yveltal in the Buried Ruins on the Mist Continent. It's said to boost Attack and Sp. Atk.
column18: locsmd=Given by {{p|Yveltal}} in the {{OBP|Buried Ruins|Super Mystery Dungeon}}

column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: effect=Using different moves boosts the holder's critical-hit rate. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It boosts the critical-hit rate if the holder uses a move it didn't use the turn before. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: effect=Boosts the holder's critical-hit rate. It has three notches.
column15: descsmd=It boosts the holder's critical-hit rate for moves. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column17: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You found it at the Mysterious Geoglyph on the Sand Continent. It is said to boost the power of moves significantly.

column17: descsmd=It's one of the Ancient Treasures. You received it from Zygarde on Apex Mountain on the Sand Continent. It's said to boost Sp. Def significantly.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Increases the Attack of the holder by 30. It has five notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Ancient Treasures. You received it from Entei on the Fire Island Volcano in the Sea of Wonders. It's said to boost Attack significantly.

column14: effect=The holder can participate in an {{DL|Pokémon Super Mystery Dungeon|Features|Alliance}} even when far away from its teammates. It has five notches.
column15: descsmd=It enables the holder to participate in an Alliance when the holder is far away from the leader. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=The amount of Belly depleted during activities
column17: such as walking or using an [[Alliance]]
column18: is reduced to half. It has three notches.
column19: descsmd=It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team
column20: the Never Hungries. You'll definitely want it for your adventure! The holder gets hungry half as much
column21: even if it walks or uses an Alliance. You found it at the Aurora's Edge on the [[Mist Continent]].

column14: effect=The holder takes an attack for an ally in a pinch. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=When a teammate with low HP is nearby
column16: the holder receives the attack instead. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: effect=The holder passes off attacks to a nearby Pokémon. Holder's Belly gets emptier every time it happens. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It enables the holder to shrug off moves and pass them on to a nearby Pokémon. But the holder's Belly gets emptier every time it happens. If the Belly gets too empty
column16: it won't work. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Makes the holder immune to the effects of {{DL|Dungeon tile|traps}}. It has two notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from Groudon in the Magma Chamber on the Grass Continent. It's said to make the holder immune to traps.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=The holder can see the light of buried items in the ground. It has 4 notches.
column19: such as a [[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]Gold Bar
column20: shine visibly. Even Pokémon without this looplet can dig items out if they check the floor. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: currencysell=[[File:Poké currency VI Sprite.png|link=Poké]]
column15: effect=Sometimes cause an explosion when the holder takes damages. It has six notches.
column16: descsmd=It sometimes explodes when the holder takes damage. It damages nearby Pokémon and makes items on the floor disappear. The holder doesn't get Exp. Points if an enemy faints due to damage caused by the blast. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: currencybuy=[[File:Poké currency VI Sprite.png|link=Poké]]
column16: currencysell=[[File:Poké currency VI Sprite.png|link=Poké]]
column17: effect=Holding it has no extra effect. It has four notches.
column18: descsmd=It's a looplet with a beautiful glow. Holding it has no effect
column19: but you can add various effects by setting emeras on it. You can also sell it for a high price.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Makes all traps on the floor visible to the holder
column18: when it is the leader. It has three notches.
column19: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from Giratina on Zero Isle on the Grass Continent. It's said to reveal the locations of traps on the entire floor if the leader holds it.

column14: effect=Increases the rate of passive HP regeneration while walking for the holder from 1 every two turns to 1 after two turns
column16: followed by 1 after two turns
column17: and so on. It has three notches.
column18: descsmd=It speeds up the holder's natural HP recovery. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Prevents the holder's Belly from being depleted during an Alliance. It has five notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team
column18: the Never Hungries. You'll definitely want it for your adventure! Holding it is said to prevent you from getting hungry during an [[Alliance]]. You found it in the Rough Tunnel on the [[Air Continent]].

column14: effect=The holder gains 1 experience point every five turns. It has three notches.
column15: descsmd=The holder can earn Exp. Points as turns go by
column16: even if the Pokémon doesn't battle. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: effect=Holding it has no effect. It has three notches.
column15: descsmd=It's an ordinary looplet. Holding it has no effect
column16: but you can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Occasionally prevents PP from being deducted when the holder uses moves. It has an unknown number of notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from Mewtwo on the Island of Isolation on the Mist Continent. It is said that the holder's PP sometimes doesn't decrease when it uses a move.
column18: locsmd=Given after defeating {{p|Mewtwo}} at [[Island of Isolation]]

column14: effect=It prevents the holder's [[Ability]] from working. It has five notches.
column15: descsmd=It prevents the holder's Ability from working. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: effect=When the holder picks up [[File:Poké currency VI Sprite.png]]
column15: this heals bad status conditions and restores HP a little. It has five notches.
column16: descsmd=It heals the holder's bad status conditions if the holder picks up [[File:Poké currency VI Sprite.png]]. It also slightly restores the holder's HP. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect= Prevents the Belly from dropping by walking. It has 2 notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team
column18: the Never Hungries. You definitely want it for your adventure. Holding it is said prevents you from getting hungry. You found it in Stone Tree Mountain on the [[Sand Continent]].

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=Foes and items are marked on the map. It has two notches.
column17: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from Kyogre in the Ocean Tempest in the Sea of Wonders. It's said to reveal the locations of items and enemies on the entire floor if the leader holds it.

column14: effect=It warps the holder near it's teammates
column16: they will warp near the player. It has two notches{{tt|*|with a red outline}}.
column17: descsmd=It warps the holder near you when the holder is far away from you. If you hold it and get separated from teammates
column18: it warps you near your teammates. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

column14: effect=Has a 20% chance to warp the holder to a random room at the end of their turn. It has four notches.
column15: descsmd=It sometimes warps the holder somewhere on the floor. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.
column16: locsmd=[[Kecleon Shop]]s

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=It makes items thrown by the holder fly endlessly
column17: affecting all Pokémon in its path. It has two notches.
column18: descsmd=It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. You received it from {{p|Cobalion}} on [[Pledge Hill]] on the [[Water Continent]]. It's said to make the holder's thrown items pierce through all Pokémon and walls and fly endlessly.

column14: currencybuy2=[[File:MDBag Gold Bar VI Sprite.png]]
column16: effect=When eating an item that restores Belly
column17: doubles the amount of Belly restored for the holder. It has four notches.
column18: descsmd=It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team
column19: the Never Hungries. The holder gets twice as full as usual from eating. You found it at the Path of Fallen Leaves on the Grass Continent. You'll want it for your adventure!
